name: Mamta Janyani

content: I have seen you girls on news and i can't believe that you're from my native place and unknown to many.Idea is amazing.Keep going young entrepreneurs.

name: Sachyen Dhlip
content: this custom made KISS's greeting card was given to her ( my niece's ) parents , who were pleasantly surprised by the idea, and were quiet contented with the wordings and the quality of the card.
